DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind study . Patients stratify participate institution randomly assign 1 3 vaccine placebo vaccine 3:3:3:1 ratio . One group receive diphtheria-tetanus-pertussis ( DPT ) vaccine contain filamentous hemagglutinin ( FHA ) , Pt-9K/129G , 69 kDA outer membrane protein ( OMP ) . A second group receive DPT contain FHA OMP . The third group receive DPT contain whole-cell pertussis . The control group receive diphtheria-tetanus ( DT ) vaccine . All vaccine administer intramuscular deep subcutaneous injection 6-12 , 13-20 , 21-28 week age . The first vaccine give week 12 hepatitis B immune globulin give birth . All patient receive DT booster 11 month , follow every 4 week approximately 20 month .
